trans-unit.source: Extends the metadata information for a class by adding attributes and property information that is defined in an associated class.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加属性和关联的类中定义的属性信息来扩展类的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: The AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider class dynamically extends the type information associated with a type or object by adding, modifying, or hiding characteristics such as attributes, properties, and events.
trans-unit.target: AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider 类动态扩展通过添加、 修改或隐藏如属性、 属性和事件的特征与类型或对象关联的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider"></xref> class by using the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider"></xref>通过使用指定的类型的类。

trans-unit.source: The type for which the metadata provider is created.
trans-unit.target: 为其创建元数据提供程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider"></xref> class by using the specified metadata provider type and associated type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider"></xref>通过使用指定的元数据提供程序类型和关联的类型的类。

trans-unit.source: The type for which the metadata provider is created.
trans-unit.target: 为其创建元数据提供程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: The associated type that contains the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 包含元数据的关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: The value of associatedMetadataType is .
trans-unit.target: The value of associatedMetadataType is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a type descriptor for the specified type and object.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的类型和对象的类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to retrieve the type descriptor for.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的类型描述符的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The descriptor that provides metadata for the type.
trans-unit.target: 元数据的类型提供的描述符。
